thread.name: ISDA Energy and Developing Products Committee Meeting - October

email.subject: ISDA Energy and Developing Products Committee Meeting - October

text.sentence: Hello All -- hope everyone is well!

We are thinking of scheduling the next Energy and Developing Products Committee meeting on October 23 from 10:00 - Noon and was wondering if your video conferencing facilities might be available for this meeting in NY and Houston?
text.signature: Stacy Carey Policy Director International Swaps and Derivatives Association 600 5th Avenue, 27th Floor Rockefeller Center New York, NY 10020 (212) 332-1202 ph (212) 332-1212 fax (917) 543-9622 cell scarey@isda.org

email.subject: Fw: ISDA Energy and Developing Products Committee Meeting -

text.signature: -------------------------- Sent from my BlackBerry Wireless Handheld (www.BlackBerry.net)

email.subject: RE: ISDA Energy and Developing Products Committee Meeting -
RE: ISDA Energy and Developing Products Committee Meeting -

text.sentence: how many people will be attending in ny and in houston also, will you need a call in #

email.subject: RE: ISDA Energy and Developing Products Committee Meeting -

text.sentence: Amy -- We should plan on about 15-20 people in each location based on the July 27 meeting.
We will need a call-in number for domestic and international, if possible.

email.subject: RE: ISDA Energy and Developing Products Committee Meeting -

text.sentence: the only room available in ny w/ video capability is 32 old slip room 23B1 - it holds 12 people.
thats all i could do in houston the room is 5c the call in #s are Domestic: 1-877-718-6588 -passcode 20952 International: 212-902-0992- Passcode 2-0952 let me know if you need anything else

email.subject: Rescheduled ISDA Energy and Developing Products Committee

text.sentence: Hello All -- unfortunately we have had to reschedule the October 23, 2001 meeting to Friday, November 2, 2001.
Bob and Amy -- could we graciously impose upon Goldman again to see if the video conferencing facilities might be available on Nov. 2 from 11:00 a.m. - 12:30 p.m. (EST)/10:00 - 11:30 a.m.(Central)
text.signature: Many thanks! -- Stacy Stacy Carey Policy Director International Swaps and Derivatives Association 600 5th Avenue, 27th Floor Rockefeller Center New York, NY 10020 (212) 332-1202 ph (212) 332-1212 fax (917) 543-9622 cell scarey@isda.org

email.subject: RE: Rescheduled ISDA Energy and Developing Products

text.sentence: Committee Meeting on October 23 I've rescheduled room 5G in Houston for Nov. 2.
Amy - will you reschedule the room in NY? Let me know and I will change the video calendar.
text.signature: Steve Ellis Regional Technology Manager Goldman Sachs Houston 713.654.8489

email.to: X- Ellis, Steve (Houston) <steve.ellis@gs.com, 'Stacy Carey' <SCAREY@ISDA.ORG, Bunkin, Steven <steven.bunkin@gs.com
email.subject: RE: Rescheduled ISDA Energy and Developing Products Committee

text.sentence: confirmed for nov 2. same location and call in # in ny room 5G in houston please let me know when you have an attendance list.
